alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, north central Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Williston to Citra. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Citra, Hawthorne, Cross Creek, Rochelle, Micanopy, McIntosh, Johnson, Lochloosa and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
